creator: ELRO Europe
descriptionHtml:
With ELRO Connects you easily connect all ELRO products to each other and to your smartphone. With the ELRO Connects app you can configure the devices, manage them and control them. All from only one app!


Complete overview of your home

You can connect many devices to the app. To be group into smoke-, CO-, heat- and water detectors, safety devices such as motion sensors and door-/window contacts, panic devices such as an SOS button but also a vibration/LED-flash button and smart home devices such as a thermometer, radiator thermostat, smart switches. The main devices is the smart K1 connector, this device includes a build in sirene and LED lighting.


Endless opportunities

By using the ELRO Connects app your life becomes even easier. In the app you can set different scenes in which for example the light switches on/off at set times and days, but also related to detection of motion or doors opening. Smart solutions such as a water detector for your washing machine, a radiator thermostat to heat up the bathroom in the morning. By adding security devices such as motion sensors and magnetic contacts you turn the system into an alarm system, but you can also set the door-/window contact to the doorbell function. Enjoy!
descriptionShort: ELRO Connects intelligent control Home Furnishing system
title: ELRO Connects

creator: ELRO Europe
descriptionHtml:
By using the ELRO Connects app you are able to easily connect all ELRO products to each other and to your smartphone. With the ELRO Connects app you can configure the devices, manage them and control them. All from one app!


You can connect a wide range of devices to the ELRO Connects. The products can be divided into 3 different categories:
1. Fire safety. Consisting of smoke-, CO-, heat- and water detectors.
2. Intruder security. Consisting of motion sensors, door-/window contacts, SOS button and a vibration/flash alarm.
3. Comfort. Consisting of a thermometer, radiator thermostat and smart switches.

The main unit is the K1 connector, which provides the connection with the internet. This device includes a build in siren and LED lighting.


Make your life more comfortable with the ELRO connects app. The app enables you to set different scenes in which for example the light turns on/off at a set time. You can also make an automation related to detection of motion or doors opening.
Use water detectors for your washing machine and a radiator thermostat to heat up the bathroom in the morning.
By adding security devices such as motion sensors and magnetic contacts you turn the system into an alarm system.
descriptionShort: ELRO Connects intelligent smart home system

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
1. Scenario module optimization;
2. Display Optimization of home page;
